TopicTitle: [Release] Off Stage - Optionally toggle staging for Engines, Parachutes and Fairings

Articles.Content:
if you ever wanted to toggle off staging for your engines, parachutes and/or fairings, then this small cfg tweak is just for you!

http://spacedock.info/mod/933/Off Stage
I think it stopped working, even though the spacedock page says it's compatible with the latest version.
Is there any chance someone could get this working again? Or is there an alternative? I would like to be able to remove my chutes and fairings and what not from staging.

Hi! I'm reporting the CKAN version 0.0.5 working fine in KSP 1.3.0

Now a question for @Xyphos: is there any way I can re-enable staging once i'm flying? Like, editing the SFS file or something?

I'm flying a mission in which I have a contract to test a decoupler and now I realize it says "must be activated by staging sequence". Not working by right-clicking and selecting "decouple".

41 minutes ago, dronkit said:

is there any way I can re-enable staging once i'm flying? Like, editing the SFS file or something?

Yay! Success! You have to edit the .sfs file, find the part and replace "stagingenabled = false" for "stagingenabled=true".
good quality of life mod.....thank you

Hi, Thanks for this mod but it don't work for me with 1.4.2 and DLC.

Anyone with the same problem or have i a modconflct?
This mod doesn't seem to work for me in 1.5.1 MHE. Does anyone know another mod/fix that might help to de-stage fairings and decouplers?

19 hours ago, Kid Kerbal said:

This mod doesn't seem to work for me in 1.5.1 MHE. Does anyone know another mod/fix that might help to de-stage fairings and decouplers?

 

Decouplers and fairings can be unstaged in stock. Just click a button "fairing/decoupler not staged" in the part menu.
anyone know an alternative to this?
